item.description:
The New England Charter Boat Association is a small group of USCG licensed Captains and associate members.

If you are a Captain, or consider being a captain, or you just want to know some Captains (with boats); you may want to consider joining the NECBA

We meet monthly (on the third Tuesday of the month) at Winthrop Yacht Club. New members welcome. $50 for Captains. $25 for Associate Members. Feel free to attend the first meeting and check us out. Join us at the Yacht Club bar and consider becoming a New England Charter Boat Association member.

more info at http://necharterboats.com

PS. Is Meetup sending you too many automated update reminders? Did you know you can stop the automated updates but still stay on the group (and continue to get notices of new Boston Sailing meetups.) go here: http://www.meetup.com/boston-sailing/settings/ and near the bottom unheck "I want to receive automated Meetup reminders for The Boston Sailing Meetup Group"
item.name: New England Charter Boat Association Meeting
